brand_identity.name: ICF Hub
brand_identity.description: A construction platform that feels like a high-end architectural firm meets a fintech dashboard. Raw concrete textures mixed with precision digital overlays.

headings.usage: Use for all H1-H3. Tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for all body text and UI elements.

mono.usage: Use for technical specs, data values, and small labels.

colors.palette_notes: Primary is 'International Orange' for safety/visibility. Backgrounds are 'Concrete Grey' tints. Use High Contrast.

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise/grain overlays on backgrounds to mimic concrete texture.
visual_enhancers.borders: Technical 1px borders. Use 'dashed' borders for secondary dividers (like blueprints).
visual_enhancers.shadows: Hard shadows (box-shadow: 4px 4px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)) for buttons to feel physical. Soft ambient shadows for floating cards.

buttons.style: Sharp edges (rounded-sm). Primary buttons have 'technical' slide-up hover effect.

cards.style: Blueprint style. White bg, thin border, technical corner markers (SVG + absolute positioning).

inputs.style: Flat, filled background (bg-secondary/10), bottom border focus animation.

bento_grid.marketing: Use 'Tetris' grid: mix col-span-12, col-span-8, col-span-4. Never generic 3-column.
bento_grid.dashboard: Dense layout. Gap-4. Use col-span-full for main charts.

hero.usage: Main landing page hero background or split screen

marketing.hero: Split screen: Left side bold typography + CTA, Right side Image with 'Technical Specs' overlay.
marketing.features: Bento Grid. Mix text blocks with image blocks. Add 'blueprint' grid lines in background.
marketing.stats: Large numbers (text-6xl), font-mono, with technical labels.

dashboard.sidebar: Dark mode sidebar (Deep Blue/Black) for contrast with Light mode content area.
dashboard.cards: Dense, high information density. No massive padding in dashboard. Use dividers.

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use gradients for buttons or backgrounds. Use flat colors or textures.
Ensure 2-3x padding in Marketing sections compared to Dashboard.
Customize Shadcn components to remove 'default Vercel look'. Add sharp corners or thicker borders.
instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Architectural Brutalist' look. Focus on typography (Clash Display) and layout (Bento). Don't just stack centered sections. Use the provided image URLs. Ensure the 'Lead Request Form' feels like a professional project brief, not a generic contact form.
